Class And

java.lang.Object
  org.tair.sql.predicate.Predicate
      org.tair.sql.predicate.RelationalPredicate
          org.tair.sql.predicate.And

public class And
extends RelationalPredicate

The concrete composite that represents a logical conjunction of two predicates.

Author:
Robert J. Muller

children
 
Constructor Summary
And(Predicate left, Predicate right)
          Create an And relational predicate between two predicates.
 
Method Summary
 void getSql(java.lang.StringBuilder builder)
          Get the SQL string that represents the predicate; each concrete class implements this method, and the client uses it to get the predicate as a SQL string whatever the particular component predicate is.

Create an And relational predicate between two predicates.

left - the left-hand side of the AND predicate

Method Detail

getSql

public void getSql(java.lang.StringBuilder builder)
Description copied from class: Predicate
Get the SQL string that represents the predicate; each concrete class implements this method, and the client uses it to get the predicate as a SQL string whatever the particular component predicate is.

Specified by:
getSql in class Predicate
Parameters:
builder - the string builder into which to append the elements of the SQL predicate; the builder may already contain the preceding part of the SQL statement
